Texts.Eng: Huh?! ^green;You've not yet gathered the required materials I need.

If we can get get our claws on ^orange;20 Erchius crystals ^white; then^green; I can repair our HRD drive. ^white;Unfortunately, I'm detecting no signs of Erchius crystals on any of the planets in this star system. ^green;Shall we see where the ^orange;gate^green; in this system leads us?

If we can get hold of ^orange;20 Erchius crystals ^white;from somewhere^green; I can repair our FTL drive. ^white;Unfortunately, I'm detecting no signs of Erchius crystals on any of the planets in this star system. ^green;We should see where the ^orange;gate^green; in this system leads us.
Our FTL drive is now up and running. ^green;We can now jump to entirely new star systems!
Our HRD drive is now stable, ^green;we can now jump to new star systems! but we may need to stock up on fuel.
